name: Holly Cooper
text: The overall experience from the people to the snacks/drinks and the movies is wonderful. The folks are friendly and welcoming and we had a great time! Very pleased with our visit and will definitely be coming back. If you are considering visiting this cinema, please do! 5⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

text: My the weekend to go to the movies. Drive 30mi to Sumter County to go see Endgame. 15min after the movie was supposed to start the girl comes out and announces she cant get the projector started and oh yea, they don't do refunds🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬

name: Ricky Guthrie
text: Called first to see what was playing, had to call back three times because he was talking so fast it sounded like Chinese. Drove to jasper and you would think it would be nice? Think again! Couldn't find anything good about it. Sound quility very bad had a buzzing sound, very outdated.  Seems like jasper could have a niser place than that. I feel sorry for people who have to go there.

name: jeffery steele
text: I couldn't get over the god awful quality. The picture was grainy the sound was terrible and I could hear a low electric buzz throughout the entire move. The experience was ruined. I get better quality on my laptop. Its pathetic given modern technology. I know its not a matter of money because they charge more than a premier AMC 30. Never again. Too bad the nearest alternative is birmingham. If this little....town ever got some competition in there that place would be closed in a month

name: Beverly Daniels
text: Read all these reviews and decided me and my husband are going to Birmingham Sorry people. Update your stuff and advertise and we'll come

name: michael sides
text: Terrible sounds

name: Tressie Dean
text:
Perfect family night spot!
The folks are great. The snacks are good and the assortment is extensive and affordably priced. The theater is not gigantic, so it feels like you're watching a movie with a group of friends instead of a few hundred strangers like at the big ones. Got hot dogs, popcorn and drinks, candy, nachos, a pretzel, and tickets for around $20. What's not to love?! ❤👍

name: Jodi Irvin
text:
This place 1s a very family oriented  place. They play movies on Fridays and have bingo every other Saturday. The people there are very friendly and funny. I love this place!!!!
.

name: Sue Counts
text: We enjoyed the atmosphere and the people. The whole group with us enjoyed the movie...we're planning our next movie night. Thank you all for what you do in Somerville.

name: Dani Corum
text: cute place to take the kids to watch  a movie.

name: Bobbie Klinger
text: Great price. Wonderful staff. Great movies

name: Ashley White
text: We love going here for bingo. I travel from Birmingham to go for bingo. My sister lives in Madison and she loves taking her son for the movies and bingo. Great prices. Me and my 2 kids can eat and play bingo for about $25.00. And believe me they can eat alot. Great for all ages. My sister and I take our mom and our dad when he isn't working and our kids who vary in ages from newborn to 14. We love turnip and joletta aka Jessica and Kim. If you're looking for a family friendly place this is the place for you.

name: Sarah Curbow
text: Love this place it is affordable for the whole family to have a nice night out without the stress of paying a high price

name: Martha Cooper
text: Very nice.  My first time there.  Movie was wonderful.

name: Defective Dynasty
text: Loved the experience of the Haunted Movies. We saw Evil Dead 2, I'd recommend the Somerville Playhouse to all my friends and family.

name: Jamie Tankersley
text: They always have something fun going on for the family. The price is reasonable as well

name: Goodlordpls Stahp
text:
This place is truly the best local theatre. The best theatre (to be honest) in my opinion.
The place runs of pure honest passion making little to no profit and dedicated to making your experiance as amazing for you or your family as it they can.
The people are great and honestly care about the specific needs of their customers. The food is great. And the entertainment can not be limited to perfection.
Instead of working for a widespread corporation and overpricing, this up and coming local business offers their movies, events, parties, and basically anything else you can wish for, for a steal of a price.
A friday night movie... Only 1$.
In short I would highly. HIGHLY. Reccomend this place.

name: Mary Wright-Hoge
text: They have awesome birthday party packages where you can rent half or the whole facility, my son had a very memorable experience, and now my daughter will do the same......check it out :-)

name: Jackie Wallace
text: First visit here and it wasgreat. Awesome place, events for ALL ages!

resp.text: Thank you!! The cast and crew of every single production are thrilled to share their talents with this community. We hope we'll see you at the next show!

text: Beautiful place

name: dawafo 256
text: A great place and very historical. I've been here many times for plays and competitions. It's one of those places that really takes you back nostalgia.

name: Matt C
text: This is a great classic theater!  I’ve been to several events here.  They are all great!

name: C Williams
text: I had never been to a play nor did I have any idea what I watched was about. I'm giving three stars ONLY for the fact that it was simply not for me. However, many people laughed and were enjoyed themselves. So please decide for yourself and give them a chance.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We're sorry you didn't have a great time - but you're right! Live theater is different for everybody - and not all plays are the same! We try to put on a variety of different kinds of plays so there is something for everybody - maybe you'll enjoy this year's holiday cabaret! Thanks so much for taking the time to leave us a review; we appreciate the encouragement!

name: J W
text: Beautiful historic theatre. Wonderful productions.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words! We hope we'll see you this October for Sylvia!!

name: Cherokee Lair
text: Great documentary series plus incredible local talent for brilliant plays!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We hope you make it to see West Side Story this weekend!

name: Dan Williams
text: I didn't even know this was in Sheffield until I went to a documentary viewing here. Very cool little theatre.

resp.text: Thank you so much!! It's always a treat to hear from folks who have visited the theater and enjoyed it. We hope we'll see you again soon! :)

name: Lola Smith
text:
A few days ago my sister and I enjoyed "The Sound of Music" at the Ritz, and it was awesome. The cast did a wonderful presentation. The atmosphere was very relaxing.
Thumbs up for all the cast and staff too.

text: Old style theater with Art Deco design. There isn't a bad seat in the house.

resp.text: Thank you so much!! We hope you'll join us again soon - don't miss the holiday cabaret and the Best Christmas Pageant Ever!!

text: I had a wonderful time. The Valentine's dinner and movie was awesome.. Will be there tonight to see the black panther. I won a ticket I'm so excited..

name: Phalecia Young (leciathegunner64)
text: We went to the Black Panther premiere at the Walton Theater.  It was a great movie going experience.  The theater is very nice and the customer service is stellar.

resp.text: Thanks for coming to The Walton Theater Selma to see this movie. Please keep talking about The Walton. Thanks

name: Tynarmia Miller
text: Great place to take family to the movies

name: Nancy Woods
text: Awesome! My granddaughter an I love all of the kids movies! Dumbo rocked!

name: Bernice Milton
text: It was good. Enjoyed it very much.

name: Kay smith
text: Very friendly staff. Enjoyed the movie. A nice atmosphere.

name: Elizabeth Hollie
text: First time here and my experience was horrible. The hot dogs were like warm, buns cold, and when the movie was supposed to start at 5:50 we were still in the lobby waiting..... for what I don’t know.  We did not get into the theatre until 13 minutes after h movie was supposed to start. So unprofessional. It took away from my excitement of seeing Black Panther. They should have prepared better. This will be my last time coming here if I can help it. I will drive 55 minutes to Prattville to go to the movies.

resp.text: Elizabeth, Thank you for visiting the Walton Theater. It is unfortunate that you did not find your experience favorable. Our goal is to provide excellent and efficient service 100% of the time. We fail to render the service you expected and I want to apologize to you for your experience this past weekend. We strive very hard to give quality service to all our customers. It is my hope that you will reconsider and give us another opportunity to serve you! Please call us at (334) 878-3456 or email us at waltontheaterselma@gmail.com to discuss how we can make this up to you. If you leave a phone number where we can contact you, I will personally call you back. We want your business and we are willing to earn it.  We look forward to speaking with you soon! John

name: Don King
text: This is a small rural theater, but it is clean and well run. It is overall a pleasant viewing experience.
